metadata.title: CVE-2020-24742 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been fixed in Qt versions 5.14.0 where QPluginLoader attemptsto load plugins relative to the working directory, allowing attackers toexecute arbitrary code via crafted files.

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
